website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable pair with interesting ear hook design great for physical activity.
pros: Secure clip-on style and waterproof to IPX7 standard
Low power consumption gives up to 6 hours play per charge
Auto-on and pairing for most Android and iOS devices

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to find a decent pair of wireless headphones but really pleased with this purchase. I found my previous headphones never stayed in my ears especially at the gym so love that these come with a comfortable hook around ear. Sound quality is very clear. I can use for just over 6 hours before it needs to be recharged which is pretty normal for wireless headphones. Comes with auto pairing so as soon as I switch on my Bluetooth on my phone it pairs with the headphones. Definitely recommend as one of the best wireless headphones I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Londoner

customer_reviews.title: All treble, no discernible bass
customer_reviews.text: I spent about half an hour listening to a variety of music (classical, jazz and blues/rock) through these and could not get any bass response at all. I was hoping for something like the Sennheiser in-ear sport earphones that I have been using for years, but without the wire connection. Even with the bass frequencies turned right up in iTunes Equaliser (32, 64, 125 Hz) and the treble turned down a third for the 8k and 16k, the sound was very trebly. So I returned them straight away. A shame really because visually the design of the charging case is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim_inWales

customer_reviews.title: Great value headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones come in a sturdy and very well made charger case. The headphones have ear hooks which I prefer as this helps to keep the m in place and less likely good of them falling out and you lose one. Fit very comfortably and they connect and pair near enough instantly. Very easy to control via the touch sensitivity feature. Good long battery life from a full charge. Very good sound with a lot of bass. I’m extremely pleased with these
customer_reviews.author: Peace&harmony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased some cheaper ones prior to these, but these are way better, the fit around the ear is perfect. The pod itself is one that goes snugly inside the ear and they are perfect for sporting. Music quality is great, the fact you can charge them with the case being closed also a bonus. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jolley

customer_reviews.title: poor sound
customer_reviews.text: bought this based on all the good reviews and i can agree with many sides, the box looks cool, the fit in the ears is great, but ultimately the sound is poor and quite "buzzy" even at low volume, which makes it annoying to use and i find relief when i pause the music. I do not recommend. will return.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality all around
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is average at best. But the headphones are actually too quiet to hear properly even while maxed out. The charger has also broken after less than a month. One of the gold bits is stuck in so it no longer reaches the headphone to charge. So..... I have one working headphone and one broken one. The headphones also have very poor connection. I went for a 10k run and they were only both connected for around 10% of the run. Frequently dropping in one or both ears. This is not a phone problem as I have many other bluetooth devices including headphones which work perfectly 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality generic product
customer_reviews.text: Very poor and believe me returning a product with lithium batteries is not straight forward but had to return it as was awful! The sound would constantly drop every gym session by 2-5 seconds enough for you to go a little crazy and loose concentration! For the price you would expect stable connection. Another thing is the volume although I found it ok - felt it lacked power to really go loud like lukewarm if you life. Its a generic product from China with different branding - look across Amazon and you will see. That not being the issue - returned as the product was not fit for end user consumption!
customer_reviews.author: KOB

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume even when on high
customer_reviews.text: So quiet very difficult to hear. No bass, good build but even with volume on high it is difficult to hear the sound , and they often lose connection with my phone despite being close to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: LX Designs Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds with an over ear clip.
customer_reviews.text: I like the clip on the earpieces as this helps secure them over my ears when out running. After initially charging the box the headphones charge continually in it so at the moment there's no worry over running out of charge. In the box is a USB charging lead, different sized earbud tips and also a striking yellow version of the over ear clips. The sound from the earbuds is clear although there's not a lot of depth to the sound. It's in stereo as I can hear the music play from left to right in some songs. They're a decent set of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: tcscouser

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Volume not high enough. I can hear everything around me. Volume button to hard to press, unless you enjoy pain and not accurate. Still can't get the volume to go lower, only higher. And i see different product reviews mixed with what I've bought which is a different product( i don't have the one with a display case). Basically the company though is good to put all the reviews on all their products on one page just to have more good reviews. No charger for the case. I'm supposed to charge it with my own charger . Maybe i can pay for this with something else, not money, don't know...maybe plastic bottles or carrots or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from these headphones, but they fit really well in the ear and the sound is good and clear! It can be a little too bassy but that may just be my ears!
customer_reviews.author: D Yates

customer_reviews.title: Delicate earpiece and Issues
customer_reviews.text: These don't have noise cancellation. They need to be routinely put back in the case to be charge, otherwise they quickly fade or stop. A bit fiddly taking out of the case, making them a little annoying as can lose them this way. After testing these (for me) kept unpairing left or right, thought it was interference, adjusted the positioning to my ears and heard crackle sound after about an hour of continuous usage. Broke connection for sound, but, could still turn on/off. Strange for me to struggle to hear at times, other times were comfortable to listen and this is persisting to happen. Will return these
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fits beautifully in ear so no fear of falling off coming out when wearing. This Bluetooth headset is very convenient. It is also very smooth when working on the phone, the sound quality is very clear A bluetooth headset is very convenient, free of the line, headphones have qualitative feeling very much, give a person a kind of cool feeling, wearing headphones to ride a bicycle is very good, wearing headphones is like watching TV home theater sound quality, the most important thing is the evening wear headphones don't boring, bluetooth effect is also ok, running is wearing is very solid, how to beat off, and a few days ago was splashed water use, also can be used normally
customer_reviews.author: Joenka

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I personally prefer Bluetooth headphones to avoid the messy cables entangling with everything I do. Have decided to buy one for regular use at home/gym and now these to keep at work. Had no big expectations for these but have been impressed. Pros: - Nice looking high-quality charging box for headphones - Great sound - USB Type C cable (I can use my phone cable to charge it as well. Cable included as well) - Good grip in ears - Functions accessible from headphones multifunction buttons Improvement Opportunities: - Charging case size. If you prefer something small to carry in your pocket, this is probably not for you. The is slightly big. I definitely recommend these headphones
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Freedom
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase these wireless bluetooth headphones, because they were waterproof, rather than a very good set I had that was not. At first I could not get a good sound from them because the earbuds supplied did not seal in my ears. Now I understand that everyones ear shape are not the same, so a little bit experimentation with different ear buds, solved the problem. These have now become my favourite set of earphones. For me, the low end & high end of the music is just right The length of time that they can be used, lasts me over a week, walking 2.5 hours a day., & put back in their case to recharge. Well Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AJON

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth headphones with an amazing sound quality. Finally I've got the headphones I was searching for a while, really lightweight and with a good and fast connection with my devices. Easy to use, to pair and to play/stop turn volume up/down. The pairing is fast, less than 2 secs and the headphones are connected with my phone. Tha charging case help in case you're not at home and you need to charge them, and finally a USB type C! You can even just use one and this is truly helpful if you want to use it just for a phone call or listening to music without all the noise cancelation. Great product, great price and amazing experience!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality of the sound
customer_reviews.text: It might be mine but the quality of the sound is a bit disappointing. The volume, although adjusted, doesn't go up that much. On a train, or in any public area it doesn't cancel at all external noise. I am very surprised, negatively, since all reviews are very good. I thought that compared to the many sets I have bought I was doing a big jump up in terms of quality. Do you suggest I shall get in touch with the supplier/producer?
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Opinion after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Max 2 metters from phone when you work out. Some time one of them loose connection. You body can block connection when you work out. I like this green suprise inside of box. I cherge it 1 time on 2 weeks and use 1/2h every day. Price 34f is to expensive in my opinion. If i can choose again i will buy 2x more expensive. Box no block connection - you must every time do off- moment when you fell/ feel you buy cheap one 😅 My score overall 7/10 Quality music 6/10 Music power 6/10 No need push them all time inside you ear 8/10
customer_reviews.author: Bialecki22

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - They're comfortable to wear and feel stable on my ears. Cons: - It's impossible to use these whilst outside without having connectivity issues. The first time I wore them outside the audio on the right ear bud constantly cut in and out. The next day I wore them I had the same issue but this time with the left ear bud. I can't seem to walk to work/take public transport without one of the ear buds cutting in and out - I assume this is due to interference. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great value but not particularly happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: The one complaint I have, is that the audio cuts out every single time I enter Liverpool Street Station here in London. I have no idea why, but like clockwork at least one of the ears will drop off every single time I go down the escalator there, and will remain unavailable until I get on my train. I exclusively use these for my commute to and from work, so this is impacting me about 20% of the time that they are in use. It's always at the exact same spot every day and I haven't been able to deduce why.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Empty box
customer_reviews.text: I received a really nice package and box, with no actual earphones inside. If you want some earphones, dont go for these
customer_reviews.author: A.Parker

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my friend’s birthday. It’s inconvenient for people who work in the kitchen to answer the phone. This headset is suitable for preparing food while talking on the phone. It’s not boring. My friend called me after work yesterday. It is small and easy to carry, quick response and good sound quality. It is used in a noisy environment without being affected. Hearing is natural, comfortable to wear, very good and convenient to use. Mainly speaking on the phone, you can hear very clearly, and you don’t worry about falling off when you hang it on your ears. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality punching above their weight!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was after some wallet friendly earbuds for my wife. Good reviews so thought I would give these a shot. Omg I am so pleased I did as the sound quality is way above the price point, very good bass levels and has very good noise reduction due to the fit in the ear. They are also light and comfy to wear in the ear. They come inside a smart charging case and have an accessory pack with different ear Pieces to get a good fit and also alternative bright ear hooks which easily to swap over. Very simple to Bond and my wife is very happy with them :-)
customer_reviews.author: shevavironxx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 'hooked' earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones along with some ear buds. These ones were so that I could go running. I was afraid the buds might fall off during running and hence purchased these. These came packaged well and delivered quickly. They are so easy to connect. You can use them one at a time of both as a stereo use. The sound quality is amazing. Noise cancellation is good too. The battery does last long. On top of all this they fit perfectly on and in my ear and do not cause any pain or discomfort either. Would definitely recommend buying them
customer_reviews.author: Pooh_Pumbi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is awful and tinny, with whatever size earplug you put in. You can still hear cars go park, dogs barking and forget hearing your music if it's windy. I had really high hopes for these with all the great reviews, but I'm extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hlmanning90

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and the convenience of these ear buds, the charging case worked great but they are not very loud. After about a week, the right ear bud became even quieter to the point that you could only just hear it at full volume. Amazon customer services offered some advice on resetting the earbuds that didn't work and gave contact for the seller. They gave the same instructions that still didn't work so they said to just return them as I was in the 30day period. I noted that I am not the only person to have this issue with this product as other people have had the same failure.
customer_reviews.author: GeeSter

customer_reviews.title: Great sound... BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and they don't feel like they are on the cheaper end of the sport headphone spectrum.. BUT... just used them out on a 15km run. Sound started off great as usual but when you sweat alot (like I do) they tend to lose the bass frequencies as a layer of moisture get trapped between your ear drum and the headphones. You keep having to adjust them to get the bass back or take them out to wipe them. Tried bigger bits of rubber on the speakers but nothing seems to work. They are good but not worth anymore than £30 :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alex_smith900

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wireless headphones, they are very good quality. Easy to charge. Clear sound comfortable Reccomend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the sound quality of these. I haven't found it easy to change the settings or use any of the special features, but hope to work it out eventually. The only other annoying things are the irritating voice telling you things like battery level when you put the headphones in (I'm sure you can switch it off but there are some things I do want to be told) and the fact that the connection is terrible when I'm listening to things online, but I think that's mainly the fault of my phone rather than the headphones. Very comfortable for running and battery life is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Saraan Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Muzili Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the quality of the music, comfort and fitting is undoubtedly the next most important aspect. You'll be glad to know that these are equally as comfy as they are audibly sound. The small sleek case which they are stored in makes it easy to take anywhere with you and the auto-connect feature on the iPhone after initially setting them up makes it convenient when in a rush or don't have the hands to start messing around connecting them up again. These earbuds show how wireless earbuds are getting closer and closer to the industry leaders every day; I'm glad I've received a premium product and haven't been fleeced because of the name. Good job Muzili!
customer_reviews.author: Aiden S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running headphones - great price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve a few sets of wire free headphones and these have proved excellent. I’m a runner (of sorts) and Love these as I like others I have (excellent as well) I’m fully confident they won’t fall out. The wrap around piece is very soft and after a two hour run I never noticed them once. The buds themselves are very comfortable- again no irritation whatsoever. I paired them with my watch (Garmin 5+) and the sound is first class. There were a few ‘drop outs’ in the first half hour or so but after that - and on subsequent runs, the connection has been faultless- it’s almost like it learned!
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good :)
customer_reviews.text: These are good as my other ones (which were top brand) didn't stay on too well as the suction was terrible. These stay on very nicely, no problems with these. And the clips are a backup which is good for sports. I am not sure about the waterproof mentioned.. If it is meant to have the yellow cover included on before submerging? Minimal instructions.. So that is unclear. I haven't tried fully underwater. Ie in the bath. Not risking it :/ The case is a little flimsy though battery life lasts long. Overall I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe M.

customer_reviews.title: Muzili Wireless Headphones earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these ones for my wife but I have used them during my running session as well; these are quite comfortable and the Bluetooth range is amazing; you can wear them and walk around the house with no issues. which is really handy. nice little compact charging case which you can place near your work table and keep them charged. the most impressive thing is the battery time which is more than 5 hours constant music play; we used it on an off for 7-12 hours which is amazing. It put them on charge the next day. Impressive sound quality; Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jb uk

customer_reviews.title: Load of rubbish and tinny!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately worked for only short period of time plus one earbud stopped working despite efforts resetting - absolute rubbish! Also, the box didn't have any sealed packaging - so no idea if they'd been tried by anyone else! Therefore, I bought a pair of JBL Contour earphones instead. All the packaging was sealed and secure labels. Great sound and good quality for less than £40!
customer_reviews.author: J Mezz

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bluetooth earbuds I've ever tried. I have small ears and very narrow ear canals so finding earbuds that stay in my ears without hurting is near impossible until I tried these. The sound quality is great and work brilliantly for music, audiobooks and phone calls. Easy to set up and connect to your phone and great instructions if you need to reset them. I cannot fault these in any way. They are light weight, and flexible ear arms. They stay charged for ages and the charging case fits great in my small handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Bondy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing inexpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: First impression, very cool headphones. The box they come in looks to be of high quality. Charging is quick and they automatically turn on when the box is opened. Pairing with my phone was simple amd works. Music quality is amazing, really happy with the sound. However I noticed a small and short crackling noise ever so often randomly during playback. Not disruptive to the music thought. For the price they are absolutely perfect. Especially that they hold on my ears even during sport like running. Finally headphones that don't fall out! The 3 different ear piece adapter make sure of this. 5 star. When in doing get them, I didn't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SpendThatMöney

customer_reviews.title: Very good couple of headphones! I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife that recently started to run every day and needed something sporty to wear. The installation was super easy and she said they are very comfortable to use. I have tested myself and the sound quality is also great! High loud volume and well defined. I think this is a good value for the money. Also (as current covid19 situation) we clean them every day and there is no problem with getting them wet. My wife is not the most careful person with technology and so far they are resisting very well. She is happy with this purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano

customer_reviews.title: Crap volume
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and feel really sturdy.... but that’s where the positives end...I would love to say they are great but the sound was just not near loud enough. I paired them with my iPhone 11 hassle free but was extremely disappointed with the sound. I tried changing the ear buds, changed settings on my phone ,reset the ear phones .. everting I could do but these are not loud. On full whack indoors you can hear ok on them but go running and they are dreadful . My normal wired headphones that came with the phone are way louder on half volume than these are on full
customer_reviews.author: colin linehan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfy bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with in ear headphones, they never stay in place - so I wanted a pair that would work for me. Theses headphones are fantastic. Sit comfortably in place and my glasses don't get in the way round the back of my ears. Sound quality is great and the volume, skip track etc controls are easy. The case protects them well when not in use and charges them too. Connecting to them from phone and laptop is very easy via Bluetooth. These are a great set of comfy headphones that stay in place!
customer_reviews.author: Mr MD Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds for price.
customer_reviews.text: It's ways a stab in the dark when buy earbuds at a lower price than the pricey big named brands (not they represent value for money but generally decent product). I've been using the earphones for two days now and they are every bit as good as products you would pay up to £100 for. The case is a little bulky, but that isn't too much of a hassle. Sound quality is great and handles the bass really well. They are comfortable to wear and and so nicely in the ear. I honestly have no probley recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: A let down
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and initially they were really good. Good enough for me. I used them down the gym and the volume was loud enough to drown out the background noise created by the in house music, spinning class etc etc. However on my fourth or fifth session the left pod lost it's volume and I couldn't work out why. Then a couple of sessions later the volume was really low to the point it became the background noise. I sent them back for a refund and Amazon honoured the return even though I was out of my 30 days. Well done Amazon on that point.
customer_reviews.author: Paratrooper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, excellent noise cancellation, brilliant grip on ears
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product: complete noise cancellation, can’t hear anything but the music even when running along a busy street. The sound quality is excellent, easy to switch songs and power off through the button on the headphone. Best feature is they absorb the sweat and don’t fall or glide off the ears even in the most acrobatic yoga poses. I would recommend this product for anyone who likes to exercise to music, and even those who only want company on their commute as it is sure to drawn out the noise of public transport.
customer_reviews.author: Pandarale

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for: cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds worked well for about 8 weeks, which seems a common theme in reviews and questions on the device where there have been issues. Now you would need to be in a very quiet room to hear anything from them at full volume. Tried resetting but no joy. There seems to be a lot of inexpensive Chinese manufacturered electronics on amazon that work well initially - with the intent of capturing positive reviews on the quality of their product - before becoming useless junk. These are unfortunately in that category. Beware. They will look and sound great for a period. But over time you get what you pay for: cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headset for sport
customer_reviews.text: i bought this headset when doing sport, so i was not expecting , especially for the price a very good sound system. the noise cancelling is so so , but allows me to isolate at the gym sufficiently. the most improtant point for me was headset that do not fall from ears and that you can hear properly music and videos, even without lot of bass etc overall , i am satisfied with my purchase, it is what i wanted to exercise, i would not purchased this ind of headset though if it is to listen music in a quiet environment as clearly the sound quality is not that good
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas B.

customer_reviews.title: Good pair - review updated...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE I have re-evaluated these as I have received a refund and a replacement set of earbuds - I expect the new set to be better! These were really good sound quality and comfortable to wear. However after about three weeks the left hand one split in two, along a crack that looked suspiciously like it had been glued before! I have had to return them - I would have asked fora replacement but they are no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stays in the ear. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these. They fit so snug. I've had issues with earpods falling out if one ear slightly so I have to keep pushing it back in but this doesn't happen with these at all. I was concerned about the backs being uncomfortable as they sit behind your ear but this is not the case at all. Not only does it help secure the earpods but you don't even feel them on after a few mins. The sound quality is very clear and loud. These are a great buy and I would definitely recommend these over any other in ear pods.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for runners and crystal clear.
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a pair which performed well. My pair lastest about 2 months and then had problems with low audible sound even when the phone volume was on full. I contacted the supplier and after attempting to reset and reconnect the EarPods the supplier replaced the faulty item. I was kept in touch regularly and the supplier responded to my emails within 24 hours. Overall an excellent product which performs well and backed up by a supplier who has given me confidence, in this product. It also comes with a 24 math warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Sa Sankey

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have stiff push buttons directly over your ear canal, so if you want to do anything with the buttons you are basically pushing an uncomfortable plastic blob into your ear hole and crushing your cartilage.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound in my ears
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted for my commuté, they're really comfortable and comd with various size soft buds so that you can adjust it. Very easy to pair to my phone Im not a techy person but to me thr sound is great, I can get clear sounds when listening to classical without the base ruining the sound but can also listen to the Artic monkeys and the base is perfect. It's like surround sound in my ears . Not sure about the noise cancelling but will see what its like when I go to work
customer_reviews.author: Beka92

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once, but very pleased so far. Easy to operate, and the sound is great. Comfortable to wear, even with glasses and a mask on! Lovely box for storage and charging, with additional ear pieces if needed. I have an expensive pair of noise cancelling headphones, but do not feel comfortable wearing when walking through the city. These are discreet, but just as good clarity for listening to podcasts on the go (which is why I purchased them). Only wish the storage box was not black, as when in my bag, I loose them, hahaha. Would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: susane

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I find these excellent in build quality, sound quality and comfort. As a professional driver it's really important to wear something discreet yet functional, these most certainly fit the bill, for me anyway even though I only wear 1 piece whilst driving. The only slight downside is that on their own they're quite quiet but together they're excellent with great sound quality, and with the added fact of the rubber piece that secures behind your ear, which makes them practical, comfortable and secure In the fact they won't fall out, unlike other ear pieces I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: MR PHILLIP D MILNES

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Before buying, I read in a techno article that these bluetooth headphones are very popular. So, I took the step, to have spare headphones for my wireless bose soundport, all the same 4 times more expensive. What a surprise for around forty euros: the support in the ear is excellent, the whole is light, the sound is more than good (certainly not the level of restitution of the bose) and the recognition of headphones in bluetooth by devices third, is immediate. I highly recommend it to those who do not want to put a fortune with a very good level of quality. Last thing: despite the confinement, the delivery was quick and efficient !!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Frasineanu Mihail

customer_reviews.title: False economy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some cheap headphones that I could wear whilst running. I wasn't expecting much due to the low price and the thousands of positive reviews got me to buy them. A few months later, the right headphone won't charge. The left one will and the case charges. Amazon have directed me to contact the manufacturer but I imagine that'll take weeks if not months. The sound isn't great. The microphone is terrible but I was fine with them. Just wish they'd lasted longer. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive buying these headphones due to their low price as my current pair are over £200. I needn't have been worried; the bass response is good with clear high ends. I have been using the standard rubber insert which I’m finding really comfortable and the battery life has also been good. The travel case is handy and has a magnetic fastening for the headphone to hold them in place and they paired up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Scags

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality earphones and case. They are easy to operate and stay in/on the ears when running. The case is very good quality and nice they magnetically slot in to the case, although a little fiddly getting out of the case, but I'm sure I'll master the technique. I needed a replacement pair of headphones for running as a similar style of Soundpeats earphones broke. The sound quality and Bluetooth connection on these Muzili are much better, although the sound quality is not as good as my pair of Jabra Elite 65t. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical at this price and also having not owned a pair of wireless buds unlike my son and friends. I've been happy using wired earphones for years but took the plunge. I'm glad I did as they are excellent and probably would be at a higher price too. The case they are in is VERY sturdy so when i start commuting again i expect them to withstand the bashing about they'll get in my pocket or bag. In the meantime they do the job for hands free telephone and zoom, which is what i seem to spend a lot of time doing at the moment!
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 pairs of these since January. The first pair gave out after about 8 weeks and I thought it was a one off (they just stopped working in one ear). Bought a second pair and they did exactly the same so have returned this pair. Shame because when they worked they were great. But the same fault with 2 pairs - something is wrong with the manufacturing and I'm annoyed because I could only return the second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I wear these with my glasses and I am pleased to say that they dont get in the way at all. The sound quality is good, as is the volume. However, the noise cancellation is non existent. Unless my music is deafeningly loud I can hear cars passing, doors shutting, pretty much any background noise, which is very disappointing as my previous pair of soundpeats did very good noise cancellation. I think this may be due in part to the low quality ear buds provided. The bass could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed. I normally buy very expensive earphone or headphones as I do LOVE my music and I workout to music all the time. I needed some quickly before going away and thought I’d just get a cheap pair for now, expecting them to be bad quality so I was prepared to search properly later. Well.... I won’t be searching anymore. These are no longer temporary, they are perfectly fine. Louder than expected and nice bass too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: VanessaUriah

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product - excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: I'm a paying customer, I was not given, gifted or asked to review this product. This review is honest & reflects my own experience of these Muzili ear buds & their customer support. Best sound quality I have experienced in in-ear buds. Had a problem with the left side bud loosing volume. One email to customer services sorted it out. New set of buds dispatched with no argument and free of charge. Very polite and efficiently done New Buds arrived one day after they dispatched them - excellent! Can't recommend Muzili ear buds highly enough or their excellent customer support team 5 star performance all round.
customer_reviews.author: Naldini

customer_reviews.title: Finally some wireless earbuds that dont fall out!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 4th pair of wireless in ear headphones and I've finally found a pair that don't fall out. I was sceptical at first, wary of a no name brand but am pleased to say that these are great. They are comfortable, I've worn them all day long and had no problem. Sound quality is adequate but these are cheap so hey... For me these are perfect I use them in my workshop and they are great for cancelling out the sound of machinery and I use them while im exercising and they dont fall out. Cant ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Artist/Maker

customer_reviews.title: Great for training! Very good overall!
customer_reviews.text: Got another pair of these "true wireless" buds but even tho they are smaller, they just don't stay on my ears when running or in the gym. These fit the porpuse perfectly, with great sound wuality too. There is no noise what so ever due to the noise cancellation, it doesn't leak your sound either! Simple to use and very water rwsistant for the UK weather. Make sure you use your phone synthesiser to get the most out of these!
customer_reviews.author: Resv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Runners
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed using these, the ear attachment flexs really well and sits quite well within my ear when running or doing calisthenics, not once did I feel them coming out of position when trying to do handstands or aerials at the park. The case is however quite thick side but with 6 and hour halfs of play time, i can't complain as it's really good for those long training sessions and including the journey to and from the park/running ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjay

customer_reviews.title: Cutting out whilst playing music/poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly... Not very good quality, I'm a musician so I know a bit about sound quality, studio and cans etc.. and I tried to use these as a cheap alternative to the bigger brands. It's not worth it, I'm sorry to company because they are probably a small independent one or could be a large Chinese one, but seriously low quality, kept cutting out despite full charge, doesn't seem to like movement so don't use them for the gym either... Very uncomfortable in ear piece.. What can I say I tried to go cheap.. Don't waste your dollar.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for active people
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound better than expected for the price, the sound is loud and crisp. The pairing process is easy and intuitive and pretty much automatic after the first use. I like the USB C port on the charging case, as well as the earhooks, which keep them in the ear while joggin, working out etc. Battery life is more than suifficient to get you through the day. The price is right for what's being offered, and these are overall recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit to have
customer_reviews.text: These are actually pretty good. The sound quality is more than decent if you play a little with the equalizer to find the right amount of balance between lows and highs. My only complaint would be with the replaceable rubber earbuds which are a disaster. The rubber is extremely soft and for some reason they dont sit well with my ears. I've replaced them with the ones from my akg earphones and the difference is noticeable. Other than that, only time will tell if these are a good.....scratch that, perfect buy
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru ariton

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy fit ever
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good. Comfort excellent probably most comfy set I owned. Fits right in the ear cup, so wearing them under a hat/cap/beanie does not look awkward. Range 15m unobstructed 5/10 if around bric walls. Battery life on full blast 4h. Build quality leaves you wanting more. Rubber pads while providing snug fit and sound islation come off too easy. Had one stuck in my ear canal. While pulling left ear piece out of the case I managed to split it open, fortunately it clicked back together with some fiddling. Overall nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Henrikas V.

customer_reviews.title: Really good battery life, sound and range
customer_reviews.text: Really great! Battery life is brilliant (both for earphones and case that charges them) and sound quality seems true and clear. Good options re sizes of earbuds and they stay on well (patience may be needed to fit a different size). Sturdy; I've not tried breaking them but they've had no issues with me not being too careful with them! Effective Bluetooth range also appears to be further than guaranteed with no issues. Pick up connections with no problem and switch well between single or dual earphone usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: avoid if planning on using outside silent room
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try these headphones after reading the reviews but I couldn't be more disappointing the volume on both headphones means the are unusable unless you are sitting in silence and even at that they are still very low avoid and pay a bit more very underwhelming
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones, very stylish & affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few different design earphones for my daughters but these ones I bought for my self because I needed the ones that would feel secure in my ears unlike the earbud styles that can fall out. These have been great! The sound is clear, it cancels out any noise & they look very nice too. I couldn’t ever afford the expensive brands but these look really cool & are a fraction of the price. I’m really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam-786

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn't get on with the headphones personally, the customer service from James was exemplary. Thank you for your excellent support in resolving my issue, it was greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: MR A D SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: true sports buds
customer_reviews.text: Needed earbuds for sports, but what I got is more than that. The silicone ear hook keep the buds well in place, whatever you do either it’s jogging or skip rope jumping. I use one earbud at a time, while the other stays inside the case awaiting its turn. This makes them enough for one week wear 2 hours a day. The case is stylish, rubber coated. The downside is its mic which is a bit poor, so I would just call them sports buds.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headset. Fits the ear perfectly. I do a lot of running thought these would not just look good but would be useful when I am out running. Battery life has been spot on and I have yet to need to recharge the case. The controls on the right and left of the earbuds are little buttons with a nice tactile feel. These can be use to control the volume up / down, play / pause, skip backwards / forwards as well as controlling calls. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Dimitar Arnaudov

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life and brilliant fit
customer_reviews.text: A typical day at work can be filled with music. I spend a lot of time outside and can use these most of the day without having to recharge, They are a perfect fit for me, very easy to skip tracks, pause, play, answer calls and adjust the volume (often with gloves on too) They have never faltered with sweat or rain. I accidentally walked away from my phone and got about 20ft before they cut off. Excellent connectivity by the time I fit them in my ears they are ready to play.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Bourke

customer_reviews.title: These wireless earphones work great
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable to wear and do not move - you can run with them no problem. Sound quality and is pretty good and the noise cancelling is reasonable ( both excellent for the price) and battery life is good. Has all the functions of much more expensive wireless 'phones. If I was picky I could say that the volume on maximum could be a little louder, but perfectly adequate. Paired no problem to my iPhone 8 and never lost connection yet. Works as a hands-free headset. You won't be disappointed if you buy them. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: so far good
customer_reviews.text: open the box and they switch on and immediately connect to my switch using a switch dongle. fit well although the in ear peice fell out once then next time i found i was walking around with the small bit in my ear for a few hours. all good after reattached to headset after testing i find all is ok until use on a pc. then weirdness happens with audio and are unusable.. i have even changed the bluetooth adapter. annoyed now
customer_reviews.author: Marc74

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are such good value! They stay in when you exercise, brilliant at noise cancelling and the sound is superb. Battery seems to last for quite a bit - although it’s still early days and I’ve only been using them for a week. They are comfortable and as opposed to other wireless headphones they really stay in. Charging case looks smart and works great! I can’t fault them! So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gorgos

customer_reviews.title: Top headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, fit perfect in the ear, good Bluetooth connection, the sound is good and very clear. Setting them up was really easy using the instructions manual supplied in the box, good battery life, recharge fast from the charging box which is very stylish/compact and easy to carry in my pocket. Good noise cancelling, auto pairing when take off the charging box, waterproof and at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: These stay in your ear when running
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner as she is a runner and the last pair of Bluetooth earphones did not have a clip and kept on falli g out of her ear. She went for a run this morning and said how much better they were. The clip holds them firmly in place. Pairing takes seconds and is simple. Sound quality is better than I expected and is good for dance music. Would I buy again. Yep I may purchase another pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Far greater quality than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very elegant set of in ear buds and far higher quality than I expected for the price. The carry case acts as the charger and transmitter and is made to very high standards. I took a few moments trying to work out the tiny typeface instruction leaflet but youngest daughter had its set up in moments. Gifted to wife as a present and she loves it. She'd tried the iPhone ones but never found them as comfortable or simple to use as these (and the Apple ones are of course 5 times more expensive than the Muzili ones. Highly recommended and maybe buy two more sets for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Nice truely wireless earphones with good battery backup and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product at the price offered. Happy to promote these type of products that genuinely deserve appreciation 'compared to all the crap available in the market at this price point'. The should quality is decent and the noise cancelling is good as it just blocks your ear canal anyways so nothing else would enter 😂. I am a tech enthusiast and lover of good music, happy to recommended this at three given price point. I got these at around £30 in a lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: Vineet Dhar

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, more comfortable than PowerBeats but just not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Really, really liked these earphones and they are great for running outdoors. Super comfortable. But if like me you also use them in the gym then that is where they have an issue - volume. They just don't get loud enough to drown out the background noise of the gym music. I compared them to 3 others including my brothers Powerbeats. And whilst they were the most comfortable to wear, they were the only ones where even at maximum volume I could still hear the gym music and people talking in the background over my own music.
customer_reviews.author: Kob

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds for sport
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you something, I workout 3 times a week intensively and I sweat a lot. I need music to get my workout going and be a beast! These earbuds are perfect and they fit my small ears and don't fall out !!! Moreover, they're IPX7 and keep working with all the sweat that broke other earbuds before. 36h of play time is plenty to use all day long. Sound quality is very good, I'm loving the bass in this! I recommend these earbuds, I love them :D
customer_reviews.author: Rouslan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit Whilst Running
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few sets of earphones for road running and these are by far the best in terms of fit and staying in place with very little movement. if like me you struggle to find a good fit with earphones I would highly recommend these for a try at the relatively low price. My only comment to the manufacturer would be that it would be good to know what the lights on the front of the case mean!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Does not fall off when running
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are perfect for running, does not come off ever, tryed a few buds before, including an expensive headphones, earphones is good, the sound quality is decent, they are very comfortable for a phone calls, there is only one thing which is the buttons they are not a touch and rather press on, the battery last long time with the single charge, overall the build quality is good and they rest neatly in the carring case where they also recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Pniow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new earphones to take to the gym, and these ones does the job ! It fit perfectly to my ears, it is soft, the pairing is quick. The sound is good. The case it comes with is very elegant and soft to the touch. It is not too bulky and fit perfectly in any pocket. I have been using it for a week, took it everywhere with me and I find the battery to hold pretty well. I would definitely recommend this product. This would make a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Super sound quality & happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. I use them around the house so as not to disturb hubby and when I’m dog walking. The sound quality is great & I’ve heard instruments through my ears that I wasn’t aware of before. They fit nicely in the ear lobes, although there are extra inserts included for size range. They have plastic arms that fit behind ears so they don’t fall off, unlike my last pair of earphones which were always falling out of my ears. Easy to pair with phone. Battery seems to last over a week & I love the case to keep them in. The charging lead is short but it’s not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: jelli

customer_reviews.title: Max volume inadequate
customer_reviews.text: Fuss getting and keeping it in binaural mode. Manufacturers responded promptly to my query concerning this. Sound drowned by passing traffic but the volume is easy to adjust. Loop behind ear came loose. Little diaphragm that sits over/in the external auditory canal seems secure but I can’t help thinking it may detach after much use. I subsequently bought a device £10 cheaper which has none of these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davies

customer_reviews.title: Only few of these headphones are good enough for workout, this one works
customer_reviews.text: There are too much choice for bluetooth headphones and unfortunately a lot of them slip out when you are working out. These come with over ear hook, which is must have. Haven't tested the water resistance but good to know it is there. I like that button is push button. My previous ones were touch and I have accidentally stopped music too many time on those.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, good build quality, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy and do not fall out of my ear like the usual style headphones thanks to the sports hook. I was surprised by the loudness as well, can overcome any exterior noise. The accessories it came with were lovely, different size ear pieces and the overall quality was very good, including the charge case which means the battery never really runs out!
customer_reviews.author: kauser malik

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: For this price sound is good. If you looking for cheap earbuds with good sound. If you expecting more forget. Positives: 1. Good sound 2. Solid case with aditional charging extending earbud working time. 3. You can use one earbud Negatives: 1. Nearly immpasible to make normal quality phone call. Everybodys was complaining that they can't hear me(water tube sound effect with a lot of noise) . Also microphone picking all noises from background. 2. Bluetooth range very poor. I was loosing connection in large room. Only good when you have phone in your pocket. 3. If earbud gentle loosing position in ear you loosing all bass Conclusion: Not for me. Unfortunately landed in bin. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata Kwiatkowska

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these they sound  rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Wow these things are really really bad do yourself a favour & buy a pair of cheaper headphones i could get better sound quality from a pair of headphones worth %10 of what I payed for these things the kicker is I can't return them as I have had them in my ears plus there not faulty they naturally sound crap & I brought two pairs so thats both of my nuts royally kicked so thanks manufacture you have successfully created something for a penny & made some really cash out of loads of suckers like me
customer_reviews.author: Gaz knights

customer_reviews.title: Well impressed
customer_reviews.text: These are a second attempt at finding the perfect earphones, and so far I think I’ve hit the mark. Sound is superb with rich bass. Noise cancelling is great, I live near an airbase and even the USAF doesn’t disturb. Very streamlined (the last pair ((GRDE)) stuck out too far). Had bit of issue at first, as they didn’t disconnect from iPhone when I put them in case, but prompt response from service dept sorted that out. Very comfortable, I wear these for four hours plus, without any problem. Overall, happy to recommend these
customer_reviews.author: BrianC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for exercise! Falls out!
customer_reviews.text: These are fine if you wanna sit on your couch and listen or maybe a really slow walk but as soon as you exercise they just fall out your ear! They are hooked but they aren’t in your ear so they flap about! These are also terrible if you have glasses because the glasses and the strap don’t fit! I even tried pushing them in so it hurt and they still fell out! definitely not made for exercise!
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound cancelling ear phones, the sound quality is amazing, however they are not as comfortable as I expected them to be, they don’t fit nicely into the shape of my ear- this could just be as I am not used to these sort of earphones. The charging port looks very nice and easy to use, very cool design. The additional colour it comes with is very cool, it’s like a neon yellow, so would be good for jogging at night . Very good for working out as there is extra support to ensure they don’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Very secure earhook. Best earphones for exercising.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite earphone. I use them at the gym and roller blading daily. The ear hook is secured staying in place, not once it becomes loose whilst running on the treadmill. I sweat alot when exercising so I am very happy that the sweat did not interrupt my music. I use the earphones on a daily based and the long battery life is good, it's on charge after 6 hours. The sound quality is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Scallywags

customer_reviews.title: I'm really surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am actually really surprised how the good the quality of the product is! The ear phones come in this wireless charging case which you can charge any time, so the headphones worked straight away. Really easy and straight forward to use, easy to connect and I cannot get over how comfortable they are on my ears! I normally wear headphones in the gym and in general for comfort and noise reduction but they fit around my ear perfectly and are not falling out which allows me to hear the music fully with no noise background. I can move about and excersie without them falling out! I'm really impressed with these earphones they're now glued to my ears!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Taylor

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones. I was looking for a true wireless budget option but they fit perfectly and the noise cancellation is superb (almost too good in some cases, I wouldn't use them while driving a car or bike). After pairing (which is easy enough) there is nothing you need to do to use them and the battery in the box seems to last a long time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesper

customer_reviews.title: Battery for the case loses its charge too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the headphones; they are comfortable and the battery in the earpieces themselves lasts as advertised, I have no complaint with them. Unfortunately after 6 weeks I have just realised that the case can now be charged from 0-100% in 10 minutes and only lasts a few hours with or without headphones in them. I can still use the headphones with this but once they die I will be looking to buy something entirely different.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Summers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Incredible value! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased some much more expensive ones prior to these, but these are way better, and the fit around the ear is perfect. I run a lot so I love the fact these actually stay in your ears. Unlike many others I’ve tried. The pod itself is one that goes comfortably inside your ears and they are perfect for sport/gym. The sound quality is incredible, the fact you can charge them with the case being closed is better than others I’ve had. Highly recommend and will definitely be purchasing many many more for friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: James Errigo

product_meta.title: Wireless Headphones Bluetooth 5.0 True Wireless Earphones IPX7 Waterproof In-Ear Headphones 36H Playtime Stereo Sound Sports Headsets with Charging Case for iOS Android
product_meta.description: 各位大佬，不要改我链接
feature_bullets: 【Advanced Bluetooth 5.0 Technology】 YTFGGY Wireless Earphones adopt the most advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology to ensure more stable connection, lower latency and lower power consumption during data transmission. Just feel free to enjoy the wireless music with high quality sound.各位大佬，不要改我链接

【Double Earhooks Design for Sports】 YTFGGY Wireless Headphones come with two kinds of ear hooks and three pairs(S/M/L) of ear tips. Ergonomic design and soft silicone ear tips ensure your headphones stay secure and comfortable for prolonged enjoyment. You do not need to worry about the fall of headphones when you are running or doing sports.各位大佬，不要改我链接

【36 Hours Ultra-long Play Time】With a full charge, the Muzili G4 bluetooth headphones can offer 6 hours of continuous playback thanks to the 60mAh battery. In addition, the charging case provides 30 extra hours of use. Just enjoy the music from morning till night!各位大佬，不要改我链接

【IPX7 Waterproof & Sweatproof】 YTFGGY Bluetooth Headphones utilize IPX7 waterproof & sweatproof design for more sports conditions. The waterproof technology efficiently protects sports headphones from damage by sweat and rain so as to ensure their lifespan, perfect for running, jogging, hiking, yoga, exercises, gym, fitness, traveling, etc.各位大佬，不要改我链接

【Auto On/Pairing & Wide Compatibility】 Just take out the wireless headsets from the charging case and they will turn on and reconnect to the last device automatically, convenient and fast, no waiting. The headphones are compatible with most Bluetooth enabled devices for most system, very easy to use. 💖12 months warranty, no worries when buying. 各位大佬，不要改我链接
